label: Simple Design System
desc: A simple but solid UI kit to use as a starting point for your applications.

label: Material Icon Set
desc: A module to include icons from the Material UI icon set in your apps.

label: User Management
desc: Adds log in, sign up, persistent user data, and more. Make sure you enable cloud services.

label: GraphQL
desc: A module to help quering data using GraphQL.

label: Markdown
desc: Use Markdown in Noodl and style it with CSS.

label: MQTT Module
desc: This module contains nodes for sending and receiving messages over MQTT in web apps.

label: Web Camera
desc: Support for accessing the camera in web apps.
